data_table.description: Respiratory Symptoms Form, Exam 2. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: RPABFLAG
variable.description: =1 if form is present [Respiratory Symptoms Form] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPABCY
variable.description: Contact year [4] [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB01
variable.description: [Cough]. Do you usually have a cough? Q1 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB02
variable.description: [Cough]. Do you usually cough as much as 4 to 6 times a day, 4 or more days out of the week? Q2 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB03
variable.description: [Cough]. Do you usually cough like this on most days for 3 consecutive months or more during the year? Q3 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB04
variable.description: [Phlegm]. Do you usually bring up phlegm from your chest? Q4 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB05
variable.description: [Phlegm]. Do you usually bring up phlegm like this as much as twice a day, 4 or more days out of the week? Q5 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB06
variable.description: [Phlegm]. Do you bring up phlegm like this for 3 consecutive months or more during the year? Q6 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB07
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Does your chest ever sound wheezy or whistling when you have a cold? Q7 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB08
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Does your chest ever sound wheezy or whistling apart from colds? Q8 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB09
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Does your chest sound wheezy or whistling most days or nights? Q9 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB10
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Have you had an attack of wheezing that has made you feel short of breath? Q10 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB11
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Have you had 2 or more such episodes? Q11 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB12
variable.description: [Wheezing]. Have you required medicine or treatment for the(se) attack(s). Q12 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB13
variable.description: [Breathlessness]. Are you disabled from walking by any condition other than heart or lung disease? Q13 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB14
variable.description: [Breathlessness]. Are you troubled By shortness of breath when hurrying on the level or walking up a slight hill? Q14 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB15
variable.description: [Breathlessness]. Do you have to walk slower than people of your age on the level because of breathlessness? Q15 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB16
variable.description: [Breathlessness]. Do you ever have to stop for breath when walking at your own pace on the level? Q16 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB17
variable.description: [Breathlessness]. Do you ever have to stop for breath after walking about 100 yards (or After a few minutes) on the level? Q17 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB18
variable.description: [Breathlessness]. Are you too breathless to leave the house or breathless on dressing or undressing? Q18 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB20
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Method of data collection. Q20 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: RPAB21
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Code number of person coding. Q21 [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Respiratory Symptoms Form, exam 2]
